text: Hi have you ever done a task like this before?
What is the best organizations and charities for children?
Well I really like Save the Children. It's international and nongovernmental, plus it helps many children and their families. Have you heeard of it?
I think I have heard of it.  Children really need people to help them.  Oh, in answer to your first question I have not done a task like this before.
Yes children really need your help. There are children in war zones and under developed countries just begging for help. Would you like to offer some help?
I would if I could.  I would like to go to some of the countries and help in person too.
That would be great. Would you like to donate today?
I wouldb but I don't have any money right now.
Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose from $0 to all your payment. How much would you like to donate?
I could donate 10 cents.  I wish I could more but I am trying to pay my bills with what I make here.
The children will thank you, do you think you can do a little more?
I could give 5 more cents but that is all for now.
So you are donating $0.15, correct?
Yes, and I am sure they will appreciate and need it.
Yes they will. Thanks, have you ben to their site yet?  URL
I just went there.  They have a lot of information there.
Thanks for your donation. The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children." Aren\'t you glad you helped today?
Yes.  Some of them are in school too.  They could use some of that money for school supplies.
Yes they can, thanks again
You are welcome.  I might go back to the website to learn more.
